promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong owl normal-type pokemon wearing white armor. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or owl. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Armostrig, a a gigantic strong owl normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Ferocious Bellow, Strength. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "owl", "normal" or "Armostrig". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, owl-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, bright lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal avian can be spotted in grasslands, flexing its mighty wings. With a fierce bellow, it can knock foes off balance before swooping in with unmatched force.
